Do you like `#Rstats` and `#Datavisualization`? This repository demonstrates base R to crate plots generated using base graphics with no dependencies. 

This is for those who like to learn and customize base R plotting functions. `#BaseisBeautiful` :)

This repository is maintained by [Anand Mayakonda](https://poisonalien.github.io/)
